article:
The 'Smith machine' is a piece of equipment used in weight training. It consists
of a barbell that is fixed within steel rails, allowing only vertical movement.
New variations allow a small amount of forward and backward movement. A Smith
machine often includes a weight rack in the base to help stabilise it. Some
Smith machines have the barbell counterbalanced. The machine can be used for a
wide variety of exercises such as a squat shown in the image to the right.
